long_desc: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
flags_raw: The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
stats1_raw: worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many
stats2_raw: people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
stats3_raw: cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.
